games.title: Dota-2
games.text: Dota 2 is a free-to-play online multiplayer battle arena (MOBA) game developed and distributed by Valve Corporation. The game is a standalone sequel to Defense of the Ancients (DotA), a 2002 video game Warcraft III: Reign of Chaos and its expansion pack, The Frozen Throne map (mod). The game was released as a private beta for Microsoft Windows in 2011, and was released for Microsoft Windows, OS X and Linux in July 2013. The game has over one million simultaneous plays and is also one of the most popular games on Steam. There is also Turkish language support.
